FwkSenCnt.MEANING: an Indian prince, ranking above a raja

ExCnt.EX: India has only recently tightened local conservation laws in a bid to give a facelift to the thousands of neglected ancient structures built by the Moguls , British or the Hindu maharajahs who once ruled the sprawling country .
When India won its independence in 1947 , the maharajas were allowed to retain their titles and land , and be paid a modest civil-list income , but Mrs Gandhi put an end to all that in the 1970s .

Brajendra Singh , the last maharajah of Bharatpur , who was a sportsman and conservationist , died on July 8 in the former princely state of Bharatpur , now part of Rajasthan state in northwestern India .
